title: Atlanta Braves will keep their name but review the 'Tomahawk Chop'
description: The Atlanta Braves will not be changing their name. The "Tomahawk Chop" chant however, may be on the chopping block.
source.name: CNN

title: Acosta asks McEnany about Trump officials trashing Fauci
